item.title: Carmelo Anthony & The Kid Mero Keep It Real On NBA Superteams, Zion Williamson, Stephen A & More | EP 2 | 7PM in Brooklyn with Carmelo Anthony & The Kid Mero
item.description: Podcast Description Carmelo Anthony & The Kid Mero explore the idea of what makes crafting a ‘superteam’ so difficult, give game to Zion Williamson, and react to Stephen A. Smith wildin’ on his weekly show. Tap In! Transcript

item.title: NBA Superteams, Zion Williamson, Stephen A & More | EP 2: TO ZION | 7PM in Brooklyn with Carmelo Anthony & The Kid Mero
item.description: Podcast Description Carmelo Anthony & The Kid Mero explore the idea of what makes crafting a ‘superteam’ so difficult, give game to Zion Williamson, and react to Stephen A. Smith wildin’ on his weekly show. Tap In! Transcript

item.title: Carmelo Anthony & The Kid Mero Reveal Story Behind The Show, NBA Cup, TikTok Dances & More | 7PM in Brooklyn with Carmelo Anthony & The Kid Mero
item.description: Podcast Description Carmelo Anthony and The Kid Mero is the pairing you never thought you needed, introducing 7PM in Brooklyn. EP.1: Origins sheds light on how Melo and Mero teamed up for 7PMinBK. The guys chop it up about the league today: the In-Season Tournament, LeBron’s crazy longevity, and young stars Melo likes. Lastly, find out what crazy culture trends need to “Fuck Outta Here!” , According to Melo & Mero.

item.title: Introducing "7PM in Brooklyn" with Carmelo Anthony & The Kid Mero | 7PM in Brooklyn with Carmelo Anthony & The Kid Mero
item.description: Podcast Description Melo & Mero preview what to expect on every episode of “7PM in Brooklyn”. Dropping December 7th. Transcript
